channel.title: **Blockchain** on Filecoin Spec
channel.description: Recent content in **Blockchain** on Filecoin Spec

item.title: Genesis - starting the Blockchain
item.description: Network Bootstrapping starts with production of the genesis block. The genesis block will contain: - An initial participant set, including committed storage from these miners (pre-sealed using special-cased randomness) - An initial randomness ticket
